website_summaries.verdict: Beer, soda pop, and ice cream floats: the sky is the limit with this cool-looking freezer mug duo.
pros: Users report that their drinks stay cold for at least a couple of hours
Very sturdy construction and a nice, large size
Can make slushie-type drinks if pouring an already cold beverage into mugs
Easy to clean, then put right back into freezer
cons: Mugs sweat and will drip water on surfaces or people

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE AWESOME!! I purchased them mainly because I love ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell the honest truth about the mugs...THEY ARE AWESOME while they last. I purchased them mainly because I love COLD beer, and they are perfect for that. But all beverages are great in these mugs. You can use ice in them and when you do the ice does not melt and water down your beverage. The other thing I find these mugs are great for are ice cream floats! Now that I have them I wouldn't want to live without them. 💜...sadly, 3 months later after using them everyday, both of them have cracked! A great product for a very limited time!! 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: I bought these in December 2017, and here in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in December 2017, and here in July 2018, one of the mugs suddenly cracked and separated the double walls. This has happened before, but I keep buying these because they're 22 oz. and others are much less volume. I'm going to buy another pair because if they last six months with such frequent freezing/thawing over and over and over again, it's worth my while.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lopes

customer_reviews.title: It's In The Bag -- as in Trash!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these mugs! No ice needed to keep drinks cold. I handwashed after every use, then stuck them back into the freezer. Tonight, i went to lift mine off the trivet. The trivet stuck to it. When I looked closely, I saw that the seam down the side had split open and the wetness on the trivet was the gel leaking out. It's not a lot of money, but it's mine and I don't like giving it away when I thought I was getting a decent product in return. Into the trash it will go. Caveat emptor!!
customer_reviews.author: calf

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for 5 days or so, but they've been used daily. I love the size and appearance, and they function better than any of my previous freezer mugs, though I loved them too until they developed some cracks (after 10 years of frequent use). I hope these mugs can last half that long but that's a lot to ask. I've always had mugs that held 15 oz, and now I strongly prefer these with 22 oz capacity. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: J. Roos

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are super large and take up a lot of freezer space
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are super large and take up a lot of freezer space. I like them but my husband doesn't bc it will freeze your drink completely before We can finish it. When we use these we both end up using a spoon to get out the contents.i would recommend but he doesn't he says, so I suppose it's a matter of opinion on if they fast freezing is a problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are just what I was looking for. I enjoy an ice cold beverage and these frozen mugs get me that. I really enjoy that they stay cold for while before I feel like it is just a mug again. They are able to get my beer nice and frosty and can turn a cola into a slushy in no time. I also love that it is a 2 pack for a very reasonable price. We couldn't be happier with these mugs!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubs as a Christmas gift Dec 2017. Followed the "how to care" instructions to a tee, it's now September 2018, and both have a long crack from top to bottom. Still keeps beer ice cold, but thought they would resist cracks for at least a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: sandra m.

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great mug
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size. Tired of refilling the smaller version that is so common. My son and husband love these freezer mugs!! Hold a lot of liquid! Sturdy mug, I just hand wash and put back in freezer. Do not put in dishwasher but they are really good mugs!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: After a little over 6 months of use, one ...
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 6 months of use, one of the mug's brim actually came loose, exposing the gel! I would've given a higher rating because it worked well for the time it lasted, and the other is still tight & intact... but the fact that the gel is exposed (toxic? idk but definitely disturbing) & this is with properly not contacting the mug with hot water, and always freezing it upside down, as others' reviews have taught
customer_reviews.author: DoP-531

customer_reviews.title: Everything can be a slushy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had for a month so I can't speak for durability. These mugs do turn drinks slushy. I'm not mad at it. My beer is awfully good when I'm relaxing in the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: AWILK

customer_reviews.title: They don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Both of the mugs have now cracked and are totally useless. I would not recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: John D. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These became completely unattached within 2 weeks so that the inner cup can be pulled away from the outer cup.
customer_reviews.author: o deam

customer_reviews.title: Both cracked and leaked gel out. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. both of mine have cracked open and leaked the gel out.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome large cup! Gets so cold my Diet Coke freezes on the inner layer of the cup. Only wish they were dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love. I messed up and only ordered two of these to try them out. Fell in love with them and now they're out of stock. Will order more soon. A 16.9oz Coke fills this mug to the inner rim. Perfect size for an ice-cold Coca-Cola on a brutal Alabama summer afternoon. 24-hours in the freezer will turn a coke into slush. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: They work extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: Once they are frozen, they stay that way. We make floats in them and they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: inbetween questions

customer_reviews.title: One has already cracked
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, sturdy weight, freezes quickly. I don't know why one of them cracked in only one month. Hand washed only. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LvToShop

customer_reviews.title: Freezing beer for life!
customer_reviews.text: Using for beer. I HATE beer that is not FREEZING cold. LOVE this mug. It created a layer of frost when I poured the beer as seen on photo. Love, love,love!
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Super cold!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! So nice that it comes with 2 mugs because there is always one clean and frozen. Super easy to clean, dishwasher safe. These keep beer so cold that the last sip is usually frozen before it gets to your mouth!
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cold
customer_reviews.text: They are great at keeping drinks cold and cooling down drinks that may not have been in the fridge. So cold that it makes pop frosty. The mugs are built strong and feel like they will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Drew

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gel started leaking the first time i put these in the freezer get a glass mug instead
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect frosty mugs.
customer_reviews.text: These mugs work great! I love them and use them daily. I’m careful to follow the directions and place them upside down in the freezer. No problems. Nothing like a frosty mug on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one was cracked when we got it and he other ...
customer_reviews.text: one was cracked when we got it and he other cracked 10 mins after being in freezer... impossible to clean gel everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: nick skinner

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mugs on Sept 6, 2017. In three weeks the first one developed a major crack and leaked freeze material. The first part of Oct the second one cracked and leaked the drink contents. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Linda Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Although I followed directions when using them, one cracked in less than a year. Zack replaced it free of charge. I have ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: 4unborn

customer_reviews.title: Good size, durable.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these a couple months now and so far he has not broken them! They are a terrific size and stay cold for at least one refill.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown!
customer_reviews.text: These freezer mugs are big & sturdy! They keep beer very cold & do not melt until you finish your drink. Love my new mugs!
customer_reviews.author: Kat from Rockport, TX

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product is poor and cracks
customer_reviews.text: I tried ordering these two separate times as a gift for my dad. Both times they have cracked, in less than six months. He is not careless with them in cleaning, etc. I would not recommend these and unfortunately options are limited for this type of mug.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Freeze
customer_reviews.text: Great are usually mugs for my liking my margaritas in something else I might like to drink out of. PS I wish I could get a couple more like this.?
customer_reviews.author: robert sego

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. I'm on a quest for the perfect glass. I have tremors and glasses are either too light weight or heavy to lift. These are heavy for me but probably not for most.
customer_reviews.author: S. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best frosty mugs I've ever used! Ordered one set of two and I'm about to order another. I highly recommend them! They keep Drinks super cold for hours. If you put an already cold drink in, within minutes it's a little slushy and tastes amazing. You can have your own frozen Coke or anything at home within minutes. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jlh

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are exactly as pictured and described. After freezing the ice stays around for about 6 hours, and the drink stays cold for about 8 hours. They work great but are a bit heavy so I wouldn't recommend for small children. Otherwise, they are perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Z. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs; however, less than 6 months after purchasing one has split completely down the side, even though I washed them by hand only. I love the size of these mugs because I hate constantly refilling my mug, but I am very upset that one is now completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Reaser

customer_reviews.title: I love these mugs
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs , I tired it with a cold beer and left it there for 30 minutes just to see how cold it would be and it was freezing cold , I also tried room temperature water to see if it would get cold and about 20 minutes it was cold
customer_reviews.author: Yoandri

customer_reviews.title: These really work great.
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs, chill lasts for a couple of hours with ice inside too. Love the size too.
customer_reviews.author: PansyCottageCreations

customer_reviews.title: Works like advertised. Very Big
customer_reviews.text: Works like advertised. Very Big. Holds a 16 oz beverage easily. Would definitely buy again. Makes a cool drink frosty which is great when it's 100 degrees outside
customer_reviews.author: greg clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these in 2016 the last one just failed they come apart at the top where they are glued together after a time I tried different glues and epoxies but I can't keep they together.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Weaver,Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. They keep my beer colder than when it came out of the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great frosty mug!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They keep drinks cold a long time pool side in the hot sun. I hand wash them and let them cool to room temp before freezing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these fairly consistently for the past 3 months or so. One has now cracked on its own which is way too soon IMO for a $10 mug and I cannot find any contact information to see if the company will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: WhatIsGoingOn

customer_reviews.title: Both cracked in the freezer within 4 months
customer_reviews.text: bought these 4 months ago, and both of them just cracked in the freezer in the same week. Followed the recommended use procedures and they still broke. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Just got these in. I have used similar mugs ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in. I have used similar mugs that have not lasted. I can tell just by look and feel that these are well made and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: You will love these mugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these mugs!!! They are great for sodas for the kids and beer for us!!! They keep the beverages cold and frosty!! The price is great...we purchased 4!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of months. Then the gel or whatever started leaking from the bottom of the cup, causing a huge mess and making me wonder if I've drank that gel.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these mugs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these mugs, keeps drinks cold for a long time, and you can pour a warm pop in it and it'll get cold fast, I really love these!
customer_reviews.author: meiljack

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty useless, I bought them to have cold beers
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty useless, I bought them to have cold beers, they end up freezing most beverages rather than just cooling. Not worth it, would not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gurmit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product Everyone needs to try these
customer_reviews.text: If you like your drinks cold these glaasses are the best thing since sliced bread Everyone shoud have at least 2 of this item Outstanding Prosuct.
customer_reviews.author: ronman

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and cracked
customer_reviews.text: These arrived leaking. They were replaced and then cracked the first time I froze them. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, first one cracked within 2 weeks. Went to take a drink from my mug, and tasted something strange, turns out the mug was cracked and I was drinking some of the glue on the lip. Threw it out. Second one died shortly after top came right off exposing gel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mugs but they ARE HEAVY mugs
customer_reviews.text: Nice mugs but they ARE HEAVY mugs. I guess whatever is keeping them cold makes them heavy. I'm not using them, so I gave them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Abbruzzese

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this product
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these mugs! The price is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Warning, may make you an alcoholic
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you decide to buy these mugs... They make you into an alcoholic!!! Nothing better than a slushy beer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Chill
customer_reviews.text: Chills fast and keeps drinks cold for hours. Large enough to hold a 20oz soda without splashing out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: These are Legit!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs! They are by far the best that I have purchased since owning my kegerator!
customer_reviews.author: Nate S

customer_reviews.title: One of my mugs only lasted taking it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my mugs only lasted taking it out of the freezer as it split in half and dropped its contents onto the floor. Not what I would call a quality product
customer_reviews.author: indian45147

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Theses cups really do a great job of keeping your drink wicked cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Gill Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I mug fell apart on the kitchen floor after 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: I mug fell apart on the kitchen floor after 1 use, the other is ok so far. Won't order again, already emailed week ago and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to finally find frost freezer mugs ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to finally find frost freezer mugs. I purchase them for my husband for Christmas. I placed only one mug in the freezer and it cracked beforee I could even use it. Sooo bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Icy beer
customer_reviews.text: I put almost two bottles of Sam Adams in one of these, and within ten minutes my beer was so cold there was ice in it. These mugs are big and are very good at keeping a drink ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: tallmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.text: My nephews are crazy about these! Perfect for anyone! Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: After a week of using the cup they broke at the top due to expanding.
customer_reviews.author: clint york

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this kind of cup. these ones are really nice, heavy duty the best i have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ogden

customer_reviews.title: handel
customer_reviews.text: great mug but the handle is to small . make the handle fatter .
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I really like the big glasses, hard to find them this size. Great product
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awful product! Mugs break very quickly and become unusable!
customer_reviews.text: One of the mugs broke even before I got to use it, after being in the freezer (upside down, as per the instructions) overnight. The other one broke less than 10 days later. Overall terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my husband to keep the beer cold ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband to keep the beer cold. he loves it and uses everyday. this mug can go in the freezer with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: lovely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as beer mugs. He loves them. They really chill a beverage fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worst frosty mug ever
customer_reviews.text: I used it 2 times and it then came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Schreck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and keeps drink cold longer than other smaller ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke fast want happy. Top and bottom part just took itself apart!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They're large, but will hold a 12oz beer without any fear of spillover. Keeps its contents very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great frosty mugs
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with the mugs and is using them now 1/20/17-One of the mugs cracked while he was using it. We would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a 22 oz mug
customer_reviews.text: Great cup keeps beer cold good but it's not a 22 oz cup. A 16 oz beer fills it up so don't go by what the description says
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Barber

customer_reviews.title: No ice cubes required !
customer_reviews.text: These are great mugs and they keep your beverages very cold for hours !
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Devine

customer_reviews.title: This product works great. The cup stays cold on its own but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. The cup stays cold on its own but when you add ice to the already cold mug then the drink is SUPER cold. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! No leaking so far. Keeps beverages cold for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: patrick simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect freezer mugs. Exactly as described. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Very big and keeps drinks cold. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Love Kate

customer_reviews.title: A waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're in the habit of buying the big bottles (22oz) of beer, don't buy these mugs. They are enormous, and take up a huge amount of space in the freezer. I bought a total of four, and so far, I consider it an enormous mistake. I would have to dedicate a whole shelf in the freezer compartment, reducing its capacity considerably. I wish I could recommend them, as I love freezer beer mugs, but these are just WAY too big! In addition, I would have to pay only a buck or so shy of the original cost of the mugs to return them....which would make this whole fiasco about a $40 error. I very much regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SharonHultman

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive my two mugs, great size and weight... followed instructions and used one for the first time today. I noticed a huge Crack down the side of one of them. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaLee

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in 7 Weeks !!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased on 5 January 2017. On 26 February 2017 The outer vertical surface cracked while in the freezer. I have no reason to believe the second mug I bought will develop the same problem. I am pursuing getting a credit refund for my purchase. The refund was denied. it was outside the 30 day warranty period. Think of it --- 30 days for a mug !!!! people own mugs their entire life !!!
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and they’re dead
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review because these mugs are apparently garbage. 6 months seems to be the magic number before they start to fall apart. I’ve purchased similar products for $1 at Dollar that have lasted for 10 years. We never washed them in a dishwasher or hot water. They were great while they lasted but 6 months is trash quality imo.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made!
customer_reviews.text: Though I liked the size of the mugs, one of the mugs came completely apart after less than a month of use!! The inner cup completely separated and the material that freezes came out. I have other mugs that I rotated with the one that separated so it wasn’t as if I used it consistently! I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mckenney

customer_reviews.title: awesome - the longer you leave the beer or water ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome - the longer you leave the beer or water (right) in there, the colder it gets. It forms ice after a few minutes. Love these - but you cannot put them in the dishwasher. They adequately hold a single can of beer poured slowly ,if you foam it up, it may overflow. There is a little lip on the inside (at the top) so it helps with the pouring but you have to do it slowly. I will order another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: ktmrider

customer_reviews.title: Mug sides are not one solid piece of plastic. ...
customer_reviews.text: Mug sides are not one solid piece of plastic. They have edges that are sealed together. Mine separated and is exposing the material that freezes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs stay cold long time
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I had purchased 2 of the 16 oz (ziggy V) love them used them almost every day for year and the handles started to crack but with tape they still are usuable however The cups are starting to look cracked but given how much use and time in out freezer I am not complaining they stay cold for long time, which is great for keeping cold beer. So when looking for new ones I looked at this brand first and was glad to see the larger size which I was wanting this time, these mugs are great the stay cold long time
customer_reviews.author: C.C

customer_reviews.title: Great mug - keeps my beverage icy cold. Needs to be insulated on the bottom / sides better.
customer_reviews.text: Great mug - keeps my drinks ice cold the entire time I'm drinking it. Only drawback is that they do sweat / condense a lot of water on the bottom / base of the mug. If they could / would insulate them better on the bottom / sides - they wouldn't bead up / sweat so much and leave water rings / puddles under the mug. I do enjoy drinking my frosty beverages from them - just wish I didn't have to wipe up water puddles after I was done from them condensing water.
customer_reviews.author: Chas-71

customer_reviews.title: Double Wall Frosty Mugs a hit at our house watching March Madness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these originally for a party in January - but forgot to take them out of the box. Fast forward, we had several friends over this weekend requiring more beer mugs. Perfect, chilled, stayed cold for the games and everyone commented they liked them better than the glass mugs. Light, durable we'll probably buy more as summer is right around the corner. We had no problems listed in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Who am i

customer_reviews.title: Great mug but cracked after 5 months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in July. Used daily for 5 months and have loved them. Got my mug out of the freezer today and it has a huge crack down the entire side all the way to the bottom base of the mug. So disappointed. These mugs kept my iced tea cold for 2-3 hours each time they were used. Would give this a 5 star rating if it hadn't of cracked after 5 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cups
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good for the price, for them for my boyfriend for chilling beers and he likes them. Glass will always be better, but these are larger than his glass ones, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Freezer Mugs
customer_reviews.text: No way are these 22 oz! I pour a 18.5 oz bottle of ice tea in the mug & it comes nearly up to the top of the mug, so it's 19 or 20 oz at most. While the mugs stay cold a long time, I wouldn't say ICE COLD. They're a little bit heavy but not too heavy for me. However, I do like them & hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: These were given as a Christmas gift and he loves how easy it is to clean them and put them in the freezer. He alternates them so his drinks are always ice cold. A coaster is needed to prevent water spots or rings on furniture. The square ceramic absorbent coasters should work.
customer_reviews.author: Arby

customer_reviews.title: Slushies!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost it is the heaviest construction and the most filled with gel of any freezer mug I've seen. I've been through quite a few different ones. It keeps drinks cold for a long time and the gel doesn't shift and settle to the bottom like others I've had. Makes fast slushies if you start with a cold beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Monkey

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Just love having one of these in the freezer ready to go at all times. Especially on a hot day. If cared for the way they say to, they last a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.author: michael l.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the beer cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to use by my pool. The mug works great for a few hours at most. Just what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. They crack
customer_reviews.text: Both lasted about 6 months of use and cracked down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Deman_3000

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within a month
customer_reviews.text: I never put these in the dish washer, always wash by hand. I took one out of the freezer and after about an hour, when I lifted the glass, The wall literally separated from the interior. I will buy them again, not quite sure I'll get this brand.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Remember To Have A Good Coaster
customer_reviews.text: While these keep drinks cold, they have a tendency to sweat a LOT because the plastic between the inner cooling material and the outside of the cups is not insulated in any way. So I end up with my water staying cold despite no ice and a pool of water gathering around wherever the cups are sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C Drywater

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I have had it in the freezer since I got it. Used it today and it does not freeze the liquid. It sweats ALOT on the outside of the cup and makes a water mess.... Not good.
customer_reviews.author: lookn cookn

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after just a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these mugs but then they came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

product_meta.title: Double Wall Gel Frosty Freezer Mugs Large 22oz, Set of Two, Clear
product_meta.description:
Ziggy V Large Freezer Mugs 

Keep your beverages Ice Cold with this set of large Double Wall Gel Freezer Mugs 22oz. Freezer Mugs are great for many different
beverages and occasions, whether it's around the pool, on the patio or on the couch. Great frosty mugs for beer, soda, or any beverage 
of your choice! These large gel freezer mugs hold a incredible 22 ounces, which is equivalent to almost 2 full cans of your favorite drink
or beverage! This Freezer Mug set includes two large Double Wall Gel Freezing Mugs 22oz, clear in color.

Use & Care For best results, place the mugs upside down in the freezer for 2-4 hours. Freezing gel crystals will turn white when frozen
(Picture shown). Hand washing recomended.

BPA FreeThese Freezing Mugs are made of high quality Polystyrene plastic, for added clarity and strength. A BPA Free Product. 

Customer Service Guarantee If a mug arrives damaged or you have a problem with your Ziggy V Color Freezer Mugs your purchase,
please contact us and we will remedy the issue in a quick and timely manner.
feature_bullets: ICE COLD MUGS KEEP YOUR BEVERAGES COLDER LONGER - Keep your beverages Ice Cold with these Double Walled Gel Freezer Mugs! A great way to cool down after a long day or being out in the sun.

FREEZING GEL NO ICE REQUIRED - Never water down your beverage with ice again with these freezer mugs! Freezing Gel keeps your beverage colder longer than freezer mugs with freezing liquid rather than freezing gel.
SET OF TWO 22oz MUGS - Comes with Two 22oz Double Walled Gel Freezer Mugs. A BPA Free Product. Handwash Only. For Best Results place mugs upside down in the freezer for 2-4 hours.
PERFECT FOR BEER, SODA, WATER - and many other beverages! Perfect for around the Pool or Patio. Great frosty mugs to take out of the freezer and enjoy with your favorite beverages.

100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GURANTEE - We stand behind our products with a Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If you are unsatisfied with the product in any way please contact us and we will correct any issue you might have with the product.
